message: I happened to be in Guate in '90-'91 traveling by bus from Chiapas, Mexico through the highlands of Guatemala to AtitlÃ¡n where the Army killed 100 in Santiago, to Tikal and on the way I witnessed many evil things inflicted on the indigenous peoples. It pains me that so many people have so little information on the activities of the US through the CIA. Many have some information on the CIA's actions in ChilÃ, but most are ignorant, not stupid, but ignorant.
